column5: Are you allowed to fish with two jigs on the same rod in Ontario??
I believe you can. I've used crappie rigs that have as many as three jigs

A fishing line must not have more than four hooks. On an artificiallure, a gang containing up to three hooks is considered to be onehook. In all other situations, a double hook counts as two hooks;and a treble hook counts as three hooks.
